Race.SpecificTitle: City of Carencro -- 1% S&U - M&CC - Perp.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Carencro Proposition 
(1% Sales Tax)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Carencro, State of Louisiana (the "City"), be authorized to levy and collect in perpetuity from April 1, 2017, a tax of one percent (1%) (the "Tax"), upon sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the City as defined by law (an estimated $1,800,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), with the proceeds thereof (after paying the expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) to be dedicated for constructing, operating, improving and maintaining the City's sewerage system and providing facilities for and operational support of police and fire protection in the City, and shall the Tax be subject to funding into bonds for any of the capital purposes described above?
